Text: Oops, forgot to mention that it's version 1.0.1.
Get it now! Before the lawsuit shuts them down forever. :)
Ah, figured out how to edit the post, so it's all good now. :)
So if this is mostly just a copy of PearPC then why even use it - why not use PearPC instead???

Simple!

Direct quote from the keygen's nfo file:

---
This release is meant to be spread in every possible way, so that there'll be no chance of making a single buck of non-final, ripped open-source software (see http://pearpc.sf.net for original code)... 
---

...so that's what I'm doin'! :)
pearpc isn't any pickle to install....pdf install manual of 11 pages! They even warn you that many people can't hack it. Is this cherry any easier?
